about.summary: Curious mind exploring AI and computer vision. Currently building DeepStream-based system architectures—learning from the ground up, experimenting boldly, and growing with humility.
about.extended_summary: I am a Computer Vision Engineer currently at the beginning of my professional journey while pursuing a BS in Data Science from IIT Madras. My interest lies in building video analytics systems and exploring the capabilities of DeepStream. I believe in learning by doing—experimenting with new technologies, understanding system internals, and continuously refining my approach to engineering problems.
about.personal: Outside of coding, I enjoy staying updated with the latest tech blogs and experimenting with system configurations. I also value downtime to recharge, whether that's catching up on rest or simply unplugging for a while also knows as doing nothing :).
